MOD 0086: THE PURPOSE OF THIS MODIFICATION IS TO: EXECUTE A FIVE (5) MONTH BRIDGE CONTRACT EXTENSION TO EP-W-11-003, WHICH INCORPORATES THE CONTRACTOR'S PROPOSAL AND COST ESTIMATE DATED 10 AUGUST 2016; EXTEND THE CONTRACT PERIOD OF PERFORMANCE END DATE FROM 10 SEPTEMBER 2016 TO 10 FEBRUARY 2017; ADD NEW LINE ITEM 0044 WITH THE FOLLOWING CEILING AMOUNTS, ESTIMATED COST CEILING $1,279,967.00, FIXED FEE CEILING $102,397.00, AND LEVEL OF EFFORT CEILING 10,260 HOURS; AND OBLIGATE INCREMENTAL FUNDING TO LINE ITEM 0044 TOTALING $93,000.00. MOD 0084: THE PURPOSE OF THIS MODIFICATION IS TO : (1) DEOBLIGATE FUNDING FROM OPTION PERIOD IV TO ACCOUNT FOR SCOPE REDUCTIONS TO WORK UNDER WORK ASSIGNMENT 4-111 AND 4-115; AND (2) OBLIGATE INCREMENTAL TO THE BRIDGE CONTRACT PERIOD. MOD 0082: THIS BILATERAL MODIFICATION IS BEING ISSUED TO INCORPORATE INTO CONTRACT EP-W-11-003 THE TERMS OF THE CONFIDENTIAL SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT CONSISTING OF EIGHT (8) TYPED PAGES, WHICH WAS ENTERED INTO BY ABT ASSOCIATES INC, BY AND THROUGH ITS VICE PRESIDENT AND GENERAL COUNSEL, BRIAN ROEMER, AND THE UNITED STATES ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AGENCY, BY AND THROUGH ITS CONTRACTING OFFICERS SHEILA FAGAN, NATALIA FISHER-JACKSON, STEFAN MARTIYAN, GENINE MCELROY, CHRISTINE EDWARDS, AND NOELLE MILLS, EFFECTIVE (ENTER THE DATE OF THE LAST SIGNATURE ON THE SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT), AS SET FORTH ON PAGES 3 THROUGH 10 OF THIS MODIFICATION. doc.ContractDescription: THE USE OF AUTONOMOUS WAVE GLIDERS IS PROPOSED FOR SURVEYS AND MONITORING OF THE UPPER OCEAN CONDITIONS DURING THE SPURS-2 FRESHWATER PROGRAM IN 2016-2017. SPECIAL FOCUS WILL BE GIVEN TO NEAR-SURFACE SALINITY AND TEMPERATURE STRUCTURE WITH ADDITIONAL SENSORS. THE LONGEVITY AND PROGRAMABILITY OF THE WAVE GLIDERS ALLOWS FOR BOTH FULL COVERAGE OF THE OBSERVING PERIOD AND FLEXIBILITY IN SAMPLING PLANS. DURING THE DEPLOYMENT AND RECOVERY CRUISES, SMALL "IVER" AUTONOMOUS UNDERWATER VEHICLES WILL BE DEPLOYED ON SHORT DURATION MISSIONS TO EXAMINE THE DETAILED STRUCTURE OF RAIN-FORMED FRESH PUDDLES AT THE OCEAN SURFACE. THE COMBINATION OF PROVEN ENDURANCE AND MOBILITY OF THE WAVE GLIDERS ASSURES THE MAINTENANCE OF SURVEY PATTERNS IN THE STRONG CURRENT REGIME OF SPURS-2, AND THE FLEXIBILITY AND PRECISION OF THE IVER AUVS ENABLES VERY DETAILED LOOKS AT SPECIFIC RAIN-PUDDLE FEATURES.
doc.MajorAgency: AUTONOMOUS SURVEYS IN THE SPURS FRESHWATER REGION
doc.MajorFundingAgency: AUTONOMOUS SURVEYS IN THE SPURS FRESHWATER REGION

IGF::OT::IGF VISN 11 CHEMISTRY COST PER REPORTABLE TEST SUPPORTING DANVILLE, PEORIA, FORT WAYNE, MARION, BATTLE CREEK, GRAPND RAPIDS, AND SAGINAW. CONTRACTOR IS TO PROVIDE CHEMISTRY ANALYSIS EQUIPMENT AT NO CHARGE AND THE VA IS TO PAY FOR REAGENTS USED TO RUN CHEMISTRY ANALYSIS. REAGENTS ARE AT FIRM, FIXED PRICES ACROSS THE BASE PLUS FOUR ONE-YEAR OPTIONS.
